company_name: Loneliness Together Chitter Chatter Club CIC
description: Loneliness Together Chitter Chatter Club CIC is a community interest company dedicated to combating loneliness and social isolation by providing safe, friendly spaces for people to connect, build friendships, and improve their mental and physical health. The organization operates volunteer-led chat clubs, nature walks, and community events primarily across Dorset, UK.
sub_industry: Community Support, Mental Health, Social Inclusion
key_products_services: Coach to Cafe Loneliness Recovery Programme
business_model: Donation-based and volunteer-driven; operates as a CIC (Community Interest Company) with funding from individual donations, small grants, and community support.
target_customer: Individuals of all ages experiencing loneliness or social isolation, especially in Dorset, UK. Open to all backgrounds, abilities, and demographics.

key_metrics.Clubs: Multiple locations across Dorset, meeting 6 days a week

location_hq: C/O C.A.N. The Chitter Chatter Club, Beech House, 28-30 Wimborne Road, Poole, Dorset BH15 2BU, United Kingdom
mission_statement: Our mission is to end loneliness by providing safe, friendly places where people can come and be social. By assuring a warm welcome to all, the chance to build new friendships, be involved in informal community support and improve physical and mental health, we aim to reduce the impact loneliness has not only on the individual but on those services that they come to rely on.
